videos.headline: Newsome breaks free for long UConn TD
videos.description: Arkeel Newsome caps the Huskies' opening drive with a 64-yard touchdown run along the left sideline.

videos.headline: Memphis converts on 3rd Down for TD
videos.description: On third-and-10, Sean Dykes connects with Riley Ferguson over the middle for a 30-yard touchdown, tying the game at 7-7.

videos.headline: Davis' long reception puts Huskies in Tigers' territory
videos.description: Bryant Shirreffs finds Tyler Davis wide open over the middle for a 58-yard gain, getting Connecticut all the way down to Memphis' 25-yard line.

videos.headline: UConn can't convert on 4th Down in red zone
videos.description: On 4th-and-3 from the Memphis 5, Bryant Shirreffs rolls to his right, but can't find an open receiver, throwing an incomplete pass for a turnover on downs.

videos.headline: Hopkins pounds it in for Huskies TD
videos.description: Nate Hopkins runs through multiple Memphis defenders at the goal line to score from one yard out, giving UConn a 14-7 lead.

videos.headline: Tigers score as Miller snags back-shoulder pass
videos.description: Anthony Miller adjusts mid-route to haul in Riley Ferguson's pass in the end zone for a 17-yard touchdown, tying the game at 14-14.

videos.headline: Memphis takes lead on Miller's 2nd TD
videos.description: Riley Ferguson connects with Anthony Miller in the end zone again, this time for an 8-yard touchdown to put the Tigers up 21-14.

videos.headline: UConn ties it up on Bloom's TD catch
videos.description: TE Alec Bloom gets wide open over the middle, and Bryant Shirreffs hits him in stride for a 30-yard score, tying the game at 21-21.

videos.headline: Memphis freshman CB makes leaping INT
videos.description: Terrell Carter cuts in front of the receiver and jumps up to pick off Bryant Shirreffs' pass for his third interception of the season.

videos.headline: Miller reels in 3rd TD of half
videos.description: Anthony Miller's big day continues, catching a long 40-yard pass from Riley Ferguson to put Memphis up 28-21.

videos.headline: Memphis forces fumble, recovers in UConn territory
videos.description: Patrick Taylor Jr. pokes the ball out of Kevin Mensah's hands, and Tito Windham falls on it to force the turnover.

videos.headline: Memphis' Ferguson tosses 5th TD of first half
videos.description: Riley Ferguson finds Tony Pollard in the end zone for a 14-yard touchdown, putting Memphis up 35-21.

videos.headline: Norvell pleased with how Tigers competed in first half
videos.description: Memphis coach Mike Norvell says he's happy with his team's effort, but stressed his team will need to make defensive adjustments in the second half.

videos.headline: Ferguson's 6th TD pass extends Memphis' lead
videos.description: Riley Ferguson's career game continues, hitting Joey Magnifico from five yards out for a touchdown, giving the Tigers a 42-24 lead.

videos.headline: Memphis' Miller makes acrobatic grab for his 4th TD of game
videos.description: Anthony Miller skies over the defender and makes a catch in traffic for a 32-yard touchdown.  Riley Ferguson throws his seventh touchdown pass on the play, trying a school record.

videos.headline: Dorceus' TD scamper piles it on for Tigers
videos.description: Doroland Dorceus takes a handoff and easily finds the end zone, scoring from 7 yards out to put Memphis up 56-24.

videos.headline: Dorceus surpasses 2K career rushing yards on TD run
videos.description: Doroland Dorceus rushes for in for a 26-yard touchdown, giving him 2,013 career rushing yards after his second score of the night.

videos.headline: Newsome jukes defender en route to TD
videos.description: Arkeel Newsome showcases his quickness, making multiple Memphis defenders miss on a 13-yard touchdown scamper.

videos.headline: Ferguson credits focus for 7-TD game
videos.description: Memphis QB Riley Ferguson praises his team's effort and will to finish the game strong for the Tigers' offensive outburst against UConn.

videos.headline: Memphis offense unstoppable in win over UConn
videos.description: Mack Brown and Dave LaMont break down the Tigers' 70-31 win over the Huskies.
